Math Utility External Functions

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the mathUtils. More...

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the mathUtils.

Function Documentation

uint32_t mathUtils_ceilLog2 ( uint32_t  x)

Description
Takes a 32bit integer to find ceil(log2(x))

Parameters
[in]x32bit integer.
Return values
ceil(log2(x))
uint32_t mathUtils_floorLog2 ( uint32_t  x)

Description
Takes a 32bit integer to find floor(log2(x))

Parameters
[in]x32bit integer.
Return values
floor(log2(x))
void mathUtils_genWindow ( uint32_t *  win,
uint32_t  winLen,
uint32_t  winGenLen,
uint32_t  winType,
uint32_t  qFormat 
)

Description
Function to generate window coefficients for FFT.

Parameters
[out]winPointer to output calculated window samples in Q17 format.
[in]winLenLength of window.
[in]winGenLenLength of window to be generated.
[in]winTypeType of window, one of FFT_WINDOW_TYPES
[in]qFormatQ format of generated window samples
Return values
none.
uint32_t mathUtils_pow2roundup ( uint32_t  x)

Description
Takes a 32bit integer to roundup value of power of 2.

Parameters
[in]x32bit integer.
Return values
powerof 2 roundup value.
